channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【From Monolith to Microservices: Key Transition Patterns】从整体到微服务：关键过渡模式
item.description: 【Monolithic architecture is a software development approach in which the entire application is built as a single, unified codebase.】Monolithic Architecture是一种软件开发方法，其中整个应用程序都是单个统一的代码库。

item.title: 【How Uber Unified Checkouts Across Billion-Dollar Business Lines】Uber Unified如何在十亿美元的业务范围内结帐
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the Uber Engineering Blog.】免责声明：这篇文章中的详细信息源自Uber工程博客。

item.title: 【Clean Architecture 101: Building Software That Lasts】干净的体系结构101：持续的构建软件
item.description: 【Modern software development often involves complex systems that need to adapt quickly to changes, whether it's user requirements, technology updates, or market shifts.】现代软件开发通常涉及复杂的系统，这些系统需要快速适应变化，无论是用户需求，技术更新还是市场变化。

item.title: 【Our New Coding Patterns YouTube channel】我们的新编码模式YouTube频道
item.description: 【Our New Coding Patterns YouTube channel】我们的新编码模式YouTube频道

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Scaled User Restriction System to 5 Million Queries Per Second】LinkedIn如何将用户限制系统缩放到每秒500万查询
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the LinkedIn Engineering Blog.】免责声明：这篇文章中的详细信息是从LinkedIn工程博客得出的。

item.title: 【EP147: The Ultimate API Learning Roadmap】EP147：终极API学习路线图
item.description: 【APIs are the backbone of communication over the Internet.】API是通过互联网通信的骨干。

item.title: 【EP146: The Open Source AI Stack】EP146：开源AI堆栈
item.description: 【You don’t need to spend a fortune to build an AI application.】您无需花钱就可以构建AI应用程序。

item.title: 【Top Strategies to Reduce Latency】减少潜伏期的最佳策略
item.description: 【Latency is a fundamental concept to consider when designing any application.】延迟是设计任何应用程序时要考虑的基本概念。

item.title: 【EP148: DeepSeek 1-Pager】EP148：DeepSeek 1-Pager
item.description: 【An AI agent is a software program that can interact with its environment, gather data, and use that data to achieve predetermined goals.】AI代理是一个软件程序，可以与环境进行交互，收集数据并使用该数据实现预定目标。

item.title: 【AWS Lambda Turns 10】AWS Lambda 10
